message.content:
cs.RO, cs.CV, cs.LG, cs.AI, cs.SY. 

The paper deals with the problem of mapping and localization for mobile robots, which is a core topic in robotics. The proposed approach involves merging redundant line segments to obtain a compact map representation, which is a common technique in mapping. The paper also proposes a new evaluation metric for line segment maps, which is related to computer vision. The use of simultaneous localization and mapping (SLAM) systems is also mentioned, which is a common technique in robotics and control. Therefore, the most likely sub-category is cs.RO (Robotics and Control), followed by cs.CV (Computer Vision), cs.LG (Machine Learning), cs.AI (Artificial Intelligence), and cs.SY (Systems and Control).
